duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement home health care plans for patients.
Provide direct patient care and coordinate the activities of the nursing staff.
Ensure compliance with all applicable laws, regulations, and standards of practice.
Develop and maintain relationships with patients, families, and other healthcare providers.
Provide education to patients and families on home health care topics.
Assess patient's needs and develop a plan of care to meet those needs.
Monitor patient progress and adjust plans as needed.

education_certification.credential: Registered Nurse License in New Jersey
